FAQPage.title: Questions and Answers
FAQPage.subTitle: Here you will find answers to your customers' most popular questions

answer.1: Moment is an online service for creating digital memorial pages dedicated to loved ones. You can upload photos, stories, videos, and memories to preserve them for future generations.

data.question: Why is it important to create memorial pages about our ancestors?

answer.1: Creating memorial pages helps preserve family history, connect relatives, and pass on memories to future generations. It‚Äôs a way to honor meaningful moments and ensure they are never forgotten.

data.question: How can I create a memorial page for someone?

answer.1: Register on the Moment website, choose the type of page (free or extended), fill in the details, and upload photos and stories. Once created, you‚Äôll receive a unique QR code that can be placed on a monument.

data.question: What does the free memorial page include?

2: Full name of the person;
Dates of life;
Epitaph or short message;
A QR code linking to the memorial page.

data.question: What is included in the extended memorial page?

answer.1: The extended version allows you to add:
2: Photos;
Biography and life story;
Messages from relatives and friends;
Burial location;
(for the video version) ‚Äì videos or video links.

data.question: How do I attach the QR plaque to a monument?

1: Clean the surface with the included wipe.
Remove the protective film from the back of the plaque.
Firmly press the plaque onto the surface. (Recommended installation temperature: ‚àí10 ¬∞C to +25 ¬∞C.)

data.question: How long will the memorial page be stored?

answer.1: Memorial pages are stored indefinitely, for as long as the Moment service is operational.

data.question: How can I edit or delete a page?

answer.1: The author of the page can log into their account at any time to edit or permanently delete the page.

ContactUs.describeQuestion: Describe your question in more detail
ContactUs.sendMessage: By clicking on the ‚ÄúSend Message‚Äù button, you consent to the processing of personal data

itemsContent.1: Legal name of the company: "Live Moment Group" S.R.L.
itemsContent.2: Field of activity: Digital memory preservation.
itemsContent.3: Service description: The Moment service offers the creation of memorial pages, allowing the commemoration of loved ones through the upload of photos, videos, and text materials. For each created page, a unique QR code is automatically generated, which can be placed on memorials for quick access to the memorial page via mobile devices.

2: Create and manage digital memorials dedicated to deceased individuals.
Upload various materials, such as photos, videos, and written content, to preserve memories.
4: Not to post content that violates the law, discriminates on any grounds, contains violence, pornography, defamation, extremism, or any material that may be offensive to other users.
Ensure copyright ownership of uploaded materials and not publish third-party content without permission.

itemsContent.1: We are committed to protecting the personal data of users, complying with the laws of the Republic of Moldova and international standards.
itemsContent.2: All personal data collected through the service will be used solely for providing the services and will not be shared with third parties without the user‚Äôs consent, except as required by law.
itemsContent.3: We may use data to provide updates on the service and improve the user experience.

2: Assume full responsibility for the materials posted on the platform, ensuring they do not infringe copyrights, are not illegal or offensive.
Not to post content that could cause harm to other users, their devices, or disrupt the service‚Äôs functionality.
4: Provide a platform for creating digital memorials, without being responsible for the accuracy or legality of user-generated content.
Not liable for any damage to data or devices that may result from using the service.

itemsContent.1: The platform offers different types of memory pages:
2: Free page: limited functionality with basic content upload options.

Paid memory page: includes a one-year subscription and a plaque with a unique QR code. After this period, the user will need to pay an annual subscription to continue using the extended page and access additional features.
itemsContent.3: All payments are made through secure payment systems, and payment is processed only after the user confirms the order.

itemsContent.1: If you do not agree with the terms outlined in this agreement, you must cease using the Moment service and its offerings.
The administration reserves the right to block user accounts without prior notice in the event of violation of the terms of use or the law.
itemsContent.2: If a user breaks the law, the administration may provide relevant information to the competent authorities.

itemsContent.1: By creating an account, you confirm your acceptance of the "Terms and Conditions."
itemsContent.2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice.
itemsContent.3: We recommend periodically checking for updates to stay informed of the latest information.

itemsContent.1: By agreeing to the terms of use, you confirm that the administration may send you emails or messages with information about the service, updates, and special offers.
This Privacy Policy applies to all information collected by 'Live Moment Group' S.R.L. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company' or 'We') through the Moment service.
itemsContent.2: The Company is committed to protecting the privacy of its users and ensuring the confidentiality of their personal data.
itemsContent.3: By using the Moment service, users agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

itemsContent.1: Personal Data: The Company collects personal data that is voluntarily provided by users, such as name, email address, phone number, and payment information when using the service.
itemsContent.2: Non-Personal Data: The Company may collect non-personal data related to the user‚Äôs activity on the website, such as IP address, browser type, and interaction with the website.
itemsContent.3: Cookies: The service uses cookies to improve user experience, track user activity, and collect anonymous data about usage patterns.

itemsContent.1: The information collected will be used for the following purposes:
2: To provide the services offered by the Moment platform.
To process payments and manage subscriptions.
To communicate with users regarding updates, special offers, and other service-related notifications.
To improve the functionality and security of the platform.
itemsContent.3: The Company may send users marketing communications, but users can opt out at any time by following the instructions in the communications.

itemsContent.1: The Company takes appropriate measures to protect the personal data of users from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of data transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure, and the Company cannot guarantee the absolute security of data.
The Company does not share personal data with third parties except in the following cases:
2: When required by law or to comply with legal obligations.

With third-party service providers who assist in the operation of the platform, such as payment processors and email service providers. These parties are required to protect the confidentiality of the data they access.
Access their personal data stored by the Company.
Request corrections to inaccurate data.
Request the deletion of personal data (subject to legal requirements).
Withdraw consent for data processing at any time.
itemsContent.3: To exercise these rights, users may contact the Company through the contact information provided on the Moment website.

itemsContent.1: The Company reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. When changes are made, the updated policy will be posted on the website. Users are encouraged to review the policy periodically.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy or our data processing practices, you can contact us at:
2: Email: [your-email@example.com]
Phone: [your-phone-number]

itemsContent.1: The Company will retain personal data for as long as necessary to provide services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, or as required by applicable law.
itemsContent.2: Once the data is no longer required, the Company will securely delete or anonymize the personal data.

About.title: The Story Behind Moment
About.paragraph1: Moment was born out of a deep and simple human need ‚Äî to preserve the memory of those who will forever remain in our hearts. We believe that no important story should be forgotten. Every life is a unique journey filled with events, emotions, victories, and meaning. These moments deserve to live on ‚Äî in the memory of loved ones, in the stories of friends, and in the hearts of future generations.
About.paragraph2: We created Moment as a social and human-centered project where anyone can share a story about a loved one. It's a place where memory becomes accessible, alive, and warm. Our goal is not just to help people remember, but to encourage them to share their memories ‚Äî because true remembrance is what we pass on to others.
About.paragraph3: Over time, old photos fade, get lost, or simply disappear. We often face the sad truth that the family pictures we once saw as children are gone years later, leaving behind only fragments of memories that can no longer be restored.
About.paragraph4: Today, the problem of memory loss hasn‚Äôt disappeared ‚Äî it has simply taken a digital form. Photos, videos, voice recordings, meaningful letters, and memories are scattered across countless devices and platforms: phones, USB drives, disks, cloud storages, and chats. We don‚Äôt always manage to save them, and one day we risk losing something truly precious. Moment helps bring everything together in one place, so memories aren‚Äôt lost, erased, or forgotten.
About.paragraph5: We all have stories we‚Äôre proud of. We believe these stories shouldn‚Äôt stay locked away in personal archives ‚Äî they deserve to be shared.
About.paragraph6: With Moment, you can preserve and pass on what truly matters. It might be one word, one photo, one story ‚Äî but that single piece can become the link between generations.
